inicio.descripcion: Hi! I'm a passionate about tech software. I'm a developer with extensive experience building modern web applications.

sobre-mi.primero-parrafo: I'm a software engineer with +3 years of experience developing web applications in the banking, public transport, hospital and government sectors, specializing in frontend web technologies with Angular and reactive programming with Rxjs applying the best development practices.
sobre-mi.segundo-parrafo: Throughout my professional career I have acquired knowledge in various technologies such as Typescript, Javascript, Angular, React, Angular Material, Bootstrap and Rxjs.
sobre-mi.tercer-parrafo: I have a professional degree in computer systems engineering from the Autonomous University of Cauca as well as certifications on web development and responsive design in Platzi and Udemy

servicios.landing-page-desc: Design and implementation of custom landing pages for your business, store or personal page.
servicios.app-web-desc: Design and development of SPAs with modern web technologies.
servicios.app-moviles-desc: Design and implementation of mobile applications for Android and IOS.

trayectoria.desc: Learn a little more about my career in the world of technology and software development
trayectoria.2018: Speaker of entrepreneurship idea in the Hult Prize competition.
trayectoria.2019: Leader in the university's software development seedbed.
trayectoria.2019-2: Angular Frontend Developer at Sitis S.A.S developing hospital software for Mexico.
trayectoria.2021: Angular Frontend Developer at Asesoftware in multiple national and international projects.

proyectos.desc: Some personal and business projects in which I have participated

proy-1.desc: Colombian company with different lines of business such as project management and human resource management.

proy-3.desc: Web application for the control of entry and exit of bicycles for the Universidad Aut√≥noma del Cauca.

proy-4.desc: Gamified didactic education strategy to teach how to separate usable waste at home.

contacto.desc: If you have an idea and you wish to make it real, contact me and let's work together!
